about_page.title: About CMDA
about_page.subtitle: Municipal Center for Entrepreneurship Development
about_page.mission_text: CMDA's mission is to develop and implement support programs and tools for the small and medium-sized enterprise sector in Chisinau municipality, in order to increase its performance and competitiveness, contributing to the sustainable socio-economic development of the municipality and creating new jobs.
about_page.objective1: Building entrepreneurial skills and culture among youth and migrants.
about_page.objective2: Facilitating SME access to financing and support tools.
about_page.objective4: Promoting innovations and entrepreneurial initiatives with local impact.
about_page.objective5: Supporting startup entrepreneurs through consulting, mentoring and integrated programs.
about_page.beneficiary1: Young people aged 18-40 from Chisinau municipality.
about_page.beneficiary2: Returned migrants who want to start a business.
about_page.beneficiary4: Existing SMEs needing support for development, innovation and digitalization.
about_page.public_institution_text: CMDA is a public institution of Chisinau municipality, subordinated to the City Hall.
about_page.strategic_collaboration_text: Works in close collaboration with Chisinau City Hall and the General Directorate of Economy, Trade and Tourism.
about_page.transparent_implementation_text: Program implementation is done through project calls and selection of applications submitted through the startup.chisinau.md platform.
about_page.ready: Are you ready to develop your business?
about_page.join: Join the community of entrepreneurs supported by CMDA

programs_page.title: Programs and Services
programs_page.subtitle: CMDA implements integrated entrepreneurial support programs, from business idea to development and expansion.

consultation.title: Municipal Business Consulting and Mentoring Program
consultation.description: Individual consulting program for entrepreneurs and future entrepreneurs.
consultation.feature2: Support for business idea identification, business plan development, access to financing and legal aspects.
consultation.feature3: Personalized mentoring based on domain and business development stage.

education.feature1: 7,733 beneficiaries of entrepreneurial training programs (online and offline).
education.feature2: 15 specialized mentors in accounting, marketing, legal, finance and business development.
education.feature4: 4 hackathons and an AI Summer School 'Next Gen', with over 250 young participants.

startup.highlight: Grants for launching and developing businesses

networking.title: Networking and Events
networking.description: Regular events for entrepreneurs and networking opportunities.

funding.title: Funding Guidance
funding.description: Guidance towards European or international programs and funds.

cta.title: Don't know where to start?
cta.description: The CMDA team will guide you to choose the right program for you

infrastructure_page.title: Municipal Business Incubator
infrastructure_page.subtitle: Modern spaces and complete facilities for developing your business

ima.title: Municipal Business Incubator (IMA)
ima.description: The Municipal Business Incubator provides the necessary infrastructure for newly established enterprises from cultural, creative industries and the IT sector, including workspaces, consulting services, mentoring and networking opportunities, for a period of up to 24 months.
ima.offer1: Intensive support for micro, small and medium enterprises
ima.offer2: Access to modular workspaces and utilities

how_to_apply.title: How can you become a resident?
how_to_apply.step1_desc: Access the online platform and fill in the application form with all the necessary information about your business.
how_to_apply.step2_desc: The CMDA team evaluates the file and business proposal according to eligibility criteria.
how_to_apply.step3_desc: After approval, you sign the residence contract and benefit from facilities for up to 24 months.

benefits.title: Resident benefits
benefits.modern_spaces_desc: Modular offices, conference rooms and modern equipped common spaces
benefits.utilities_desc: High-speed internet, utilities, cleaning and maintenance services
benefits.networking_desc: Regular events, collaboration opportunities with other residents
benefits.consulting_desc: Access to mentors and consultants specialized in various fields

partners_page.title: Partnerships
partners_page.subtitle: CMDA develops strategic partnerships at local, national and international levels to connect entrepreneurs from Chisinau to resources, expertise and funding.

international.title: International Partners
international.subtitle: We collaborate with institutions and organizations from all over Europe to bring the best practices and opportunities for entrepreneurs from Chisinau.

projects.title: European projects and programs
projects.subtitle: CMDA actively implements and participates in multiple European entrepreneurial development programs.
projects.eu_support: With the support of the European Union

internal.title: Internal Partners
internal.subtitle: We work closely with national institutions and organizations to provide comprehensive support to entrepreneurs.

become_partner.title: Become a CMDA partner
become_partner.description: Together we can develop the entrepreneurial ecosystem in Chisinau

contact_page.subtitle: We are here to help you develop your business
